name.en: Principle of Environmental Sampling and Analysis

department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
“This course provides an understanding of the
foundamental of sampling analysis, quality assurance
and quality control.“
goal.en:
“This course provides an understanding of the
foundamental of sampling analysis, quality assurance
and quality control.“

outline.ch:
Course Outline, Intro of Analytical Chemistry
Lec：Significant Figure, Errors in Chemical Analysis
Lec：Errors in Chemical Analysis
Lec：Confidence Interval
Lec：Sampling, standardization, and calibration
Lec：Spectrochemical Methods
Lec：Detection Limit, Presentation Skills, Atomic Absorption Spectrometer
Lec：ICP, GC, LC
Lab：ICP and Atomic Adsorption
Lab：COD and MLSS
Lab: UV/Vis (ammonia)
Lab：GC
outline.en:
Course Outline, Intro of Analytical Chemistry
Lec：Significant Figure, Errors in Chemical Analysis
Lec：Errors in Chemical Analysis
Lec：Confidence Interval
Lec：Sampling, standardization, and calibration
Lec：Spectrochemical Methods
Lec：Detection Limit, Presentation Skills, Atomic Absorption Spectrometer
Lec：ICP, GC, LC
Lab：ICP and Atomic Adsorption
Lab：COD and MLSS
Lab: UV/Vis (ammonia)
Lab：GC

textbook.ch:
“◎ Basic approaches and methods for quality assurance
and quailty control in sample collection and storage
for environmental monitoring. ““The Science of the
Total Environmental Volume: 176, Issue:1-3,
December 22, 1995,
◎Determaination of cadmium and lead in urine by
derivative flame atomic absorption spectrometry
using the atoms trapping techniques.
““Spectorchemica Acta Part B: Atomic Spectroscopy
Volume: 52, Issue: 6, June 15, 1997,
◎Graphical methods for the determination of
water/gas partition coefficients of volatile organic
compounds by a headspace gas chromatography
technique:Bakierowska, A.-M. and Trzeszczynski, J.
Fluid Phase Equilibria, 2003, 213, (1-2), 139–146.“
textbook.en:
“◎ Basic approaches and methods for quality assurance
and quailty control in sample collection and storage
for environmental monitoring. ““The Science of the
Total Environmental Volume: 176, Issue:1-3,
December 22, 1995,
◎Determaination of cadmium and lead in urine by
derivative flame atomic absorption spectrometry
using the atoms trapping techniques.
““Spectorchemica Acta Part B: Atomic Spectroscopy
Volume: 52, Issue: 6, June 15, 1997,
◎Graphical methods for the determination of
water/gas partition coefficients of volatile organic
compounds by a headspace gas chromatography
technique:Bakierowska, A.-M. and Trzeszczynski, J.
Fluid Phase Equilibria, 2003, 213, (1-2), 139–146.“

ch.competencies: 以人為本的社會價值與環境價值判斷與抉擇能力
符合系統思維的環境問題發現、分析及解決能力
合乎情理法的環境科學知識與工程技術運用能力
前瞻宏觀的需求分析、規劃決策及科技研發能力
積極有效的溝通表達、協調合作及整合領導能力
持續不斷的人文、科學及工程智能學習創新能力

en.competencies: The ability to justify principles of judgment and choice with considering the relation between social welfare and environmental sustainability
The ability to define and analyze environmental issues, to strategically plan and propose potential solutions
The ability to implement scientific knowledge and engineering techniques in the face of environmental problems
The ability to assess prospective needs at the macro level, to formulate decision-making, and to direct R & D.
The ability to lead positive and effective communication, coordination, cooperation and integration.
The ability to persistently innovate intelligent humanities, science and engineering.
